description: Income support of Rs. 6,000 per year provided to all landholding farmer families in three equal installments.
eligibility: All farmer families owning cultivable land, subject to specific exclusions.
benefits: Direct income support of Rs. 6,000 annually in three equal installments.
application_process: Farmers need to register via the PM-Kisan online portal or at local CSC centers.

description: A financing facility of Rs. 1 lakh crore to develop farm-gate and aggregation-point infrastructure for post-harvest management.
eligibility: Farmers, FPOs, PACS, agri-entrepreneurs, and other eligible entities.
benefits: 3% interest subvention on loans up to Rs. 2 crore, with a credit guarantee for collateral-free loans.
application_process: Eligible beneficiaries can apply through participating lending institutions, including banks and NABARD.

description: A scheme focused on promoting agricultural extension by delivering farmer-centric and accountable services.
eligibility: Farmers, Farmer Interest Groups (FIGs), and Farmer Producer Organizations (FPOs) involved in agriculture and allied sectors.
benefits: Access to training, technology demonstrations, and convergence with other government programs for agricultural development.
application_process: Farmers can connect with local ATMA offices or agricultural departments to participate in programs.

description: A nationwide information network providing real-time data on agricultural commodities' market arrivals and prices.
eligibility: Accessible to farmers, traders, and agribusinesses involved in agricultural marketing.
benefits: Access to reliable data on market prices, market transparency, and better decision-making for farmers.
application_process: Farmers can access AGMARKNET data through the official AGMARKNET portal or via APMC-provided facilities.
